trans-unit.source: Defines a collection that stores <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> objects.

trans-unit.source: The index into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> at which the new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> was inserted.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> values in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance at the specified index.

trans-unit.target: De eendimensionale <xref:System.Array>die het doel van de waarden die zijn gekopieerd uit <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index into `array` to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: De index in `array` om te beginnen met het kopiëren.

trans-unit.source: The array parameter is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: De array parameter is multidimensionaal.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the is greater than the available space between arrayIndex and the end of array.
trans-unit.target: - of - het aantal elementen in de groter is dan de beschikbare ruimte tussen arrayIndex en het einde van array .

trans-unit.source: The array parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The array parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The arrayIndex parameter is less than the array parameter's lower bound.
trans-unit.target: De arrayIndex -parameter is kleiner dan de array ondergrens van de parameter.

trans-unit.target: Een hash-waarde op basis van alle waarden in de huidige builds <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> vinden.

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified by the value parameter in the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: De index van de opgegeven door de value parameter in de als gevonden, anders wordt -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> at the specified index.

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
trans-unit.target: De index parameter valt buiten het geldige bereik van indexen voor de verzameling.
